ants.name: Worker Ant
ants.description: Basic worker ant. Generates 1 resource.

ants.name: Soldier Ant
ants.description: Combat ant. Can attack opponents' construction rows.

ants.name: Scout Ant
ants.description: Generates 1 resource. Draw 1 additional card when played.

ants.name: Forager Ant
ants.description: Generates 2 resources when played.

ants.name: Elite Soldier Ant
ants.description: Powerful combat ant with high attack and defense. Generates 1 resource.

ants.name: Queen Ant
ants.description: Generates 3 resources. Draw 2 cards when played.

ants.name: Architect Ant
ants.description: Generates 1 resource. Strong defensive ant.

ants.name: Nurse Ant
ants.description: Generates 1 resource. Draw 1 ant when played.

ants.name: Explorer Ant
ants.description: Generates 1 resource. Look at top 3 cards of deck, put 1 in hand, rest on bottom.

ants.name: Heavy Lifter Ant
ants.description: Generates 3 resources when played.

ants.name: Guard Ant
ants.description: High defense. Protects construction row.

ants.name: Messenger Ant
ants.description: Generates 1 resource. Draw 1 card. Cheap and fast.

ants.name: Raider Ant
ants.description: Generates 1 resource. Force opponent to discard a card when attacking successfully.

ants.name: Carpenter Ant
ants.description: Generates 2 resources when played.

ants.name: Recycler Ant
ants.description: Trash a card from your hand or discard pile, permanently removing it from your deck.

ants.name: Optimizer Ant
ants.description: Generates 2 resources. Trash a card from your hand or discard pile, permanently removing it from your deck.

ants.name: Bugs Aldrin
ants.description: High defense. Returns to your discard pile after completing a construction instead of being scrapped.

ants.name: Master Scrap
ants.description: Scraps 2 cards.

ants.name: Master explore
ants.description: explores 2 cards.

ants.name: Master sabotage
ants.description: explores 2 cards.
